name: pymorphy3-dicts-ru

chunks.text:
pymorphy3-dicts-ru
==========================================================

Russian dictionaries for `pymorphy3`_.

.. _pymorphy3: https://github.com/no-plagiarism/pymorphy3

Installation
------------

Install::

Usage
-----

To use these dictionaries with pymorphy2 create MorphAnalyzer
with ``lang='ru'`` parameter:

>>> import pymorphy3
>>> morph = pymorphy3.MorphAnalyzer(lang='ru')

To get a path to the installed dictionary data use
``pymorphy3_dicts_ru.get_path()`` method.

Development
-----------

The main repo is https://github.com/no-plagiarism/pymorphy3-dicts. The repository
doesn't contain the data itself: only package template and update
scripts are stored in VCS.

License for Python code in this package is MIT.
The data is licensed under
`Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike `_.

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with this library:

This library is used to enable Russian language support for the pymorphy3 morphological analyzer, allowing developers to perform tasks such as tokenization and part-of-speech tagging on Russian text. By installing and using these dictionaries, developers can leverage the capabilities of pymorphy3 to analyze and process large volumes of Russian text data with high accuracy.
